email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Verify your Netflix billing information now!

Dear valued Netflix customer,

We are contacting you to inform you that there is an issue with your billing information on file. In order to ensure uninterrupted service and continue enjoying all the amazing content on Netflix, we kindly ask you to verify your billing information immediately.

Please click on the link below to securely update your payment details:
[Malicious link]

Failure to update your billing information within the next 24 hours may result in a temporary suspension of your account. We value your continued loyalty and want to make sure you have a seamless streaming experience.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
The Netflix Team
